description: Rugged, multifunctional shorts designed for use in and out of the water, made with quick-drying 100% postconsumer recycled NetPlus™ nylon from recycled fishing nets to help reduce ocean plastic pollution. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Baggies Shorts, 5" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Elasticized waistband with internal drawstring; quick-drying black mesh liner
Vertical side pockets reduce drag in water; pocket bags have drain-and-dry mesh corners; rear pocket has a flap that closes with a low-profile snap for security

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
specs.value: Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
